titleStmt.title: Die Jovis 9⁰ Septembr. 1641. Whereas it doth appear to this House by certain informations received from divers parts of this kingdom, that the pole-money doth generally come to a far lesse sum, then by the true intent of the act it both might and ought to do ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings Most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
With royal seal of Charles I at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the Kings Most Excellent Majestie: and
